subtitle: One dashboard to run an AI software company

slides.title: Command Center
slides.subtitle: One dashboard to run an AI software company
slides.tagline: 12 products. 17 agents. One pane of glass.

slides.heading: The Problem
slides.statement: Running an AI-agent software company has no dashboard
points: AI agent orchestration across 17 specialist agents requires constant context-switching
Product portfolio visibility is scattered across repos, docs, and CI pipelines
No single view shows health, progress, and status across 12+ simultaneous products
CEO decision-making requires assembling data from git, GitHub, docs, and agent logs manually

slides.heading: The Solution
slides.statement: A real-time company operations dashboard that reads directly from the monorepo
points: Zero-database architecture — reads from filesystem and git CLI for always-fresh data
Product catalog — status, ports, CI pipelines, docs, health for all 12 products
Agent Hub — 17 agents with capabilities, performance, and invocation history
Built-in document viewer with Mermaid rendering and PDF export

features.title: Executive Overview
features.description: KPIs, product health, and recent activity

features.title: Product Catalog
features.description: 12 products with status, ports, and CI state

features.title: Agent Hub
features.description: 16 AI agents with capabilities and metrics

features.title: Doc Viewer
features.description: Mermaid diagrams, markdown, and PDF export

features.title: Git Analytics
features.description: Commit history, branch status, CI results

features.title: Command Terminal
features.description: Invoke Orchestrator commands from the UI

timeline.milestone: Foundation — overview dashboard, product catalog, agent hub
Doc viewer with Mermaid + PDF export, git analytics
Showcase mode with presentation view and audience filtering
Pitch deck presentation mode for all 12 products

slides.heading: Vision
slides.statement: The operating system for AI-first software companies
milestones: 2026: Full company visibility — products, agents, docs, git, CI
2027: AI-powered insights — anomaly detection, velocity forecasts
2028: Open-source the framework for other AI-agent companies
2030: The standard dashboard for AI-orchestrated development
